Okay, I will create a plan for your dance reel app, "Reel'It," focusing on Pantsula, Amapiano, and other African dance styles.

Features for the First Version:

- A welcoming splash screen with the Reel'It logo, followed by a login/sign-up screen.
- A home screen displaying dance reels with icons for home, search, reel upload, dance tutorials, and profile.
- A dedicated "Challenges" category for users to select when posting reels.

Design Elements:

- Colors: Base color white, primary text color black, accent colors vibrant shades inspired by African textiles.
- Typography: Modern, clean fonts that complement the energetic dance content.

Let's create an elegant and functional mobile app!

Below are the changes and new files implementing your Reel'It dance reels app with splash screen, login/sign-up, and the main bottom tabbed interface: Home, Search, Upload Reel, Tutorials, and Profile. It focuses on dance styles like Pantsula, Amapiano, Afrobeat hybrids, Neo-House, Dancefloor Sounds, Spantsula, Sgija, Indlamu, Trap, and especially a Challenges category for posting.

Note:
- This version uses in-memory state (no backend). If you want real accounts, storage, and feeds, please enable Supabase by pressing the Supabase button and connect to your Supabase project. We can wire it up next.
- Maps are not used. If needed later, react-native-maps is not supported on web in Natively.
- The OS splash remains the one configured in app.json. The in-app Splash screen shows the Reel'It logo text and animation as requested.
